features: Snuggle SuperCare liquid fabric softener protects colors from fading, protects against wear and tear and helps clothes hold shape plus the Snuggle benefits you love like Snuggly Softness and Long-Lasting Freshness
Protect the clothes you love with specially formulated technology that keeps your clothes looking newer longer* *vs. the leading value liquid detergent alone
This concentrated formula delivers 2X more softening in every drop so now you don’t have to use as much to leave your clothes Snuggly soft.
Snuggle SuperCare fabric softener is safe for both high efficiency (HE) and regular washing machines
You get one bottle of Snuggle SuperCare 2X Concentrated liquid fabric softener in the Lilies & Linen scent, enough for 150 regular loads.
body.description: Snuggle SuperCare keeps clothes looking newer longer*. This fabric conditioner protects the clothes you love with specially formulated technology that prevents wear & tear and color fading. All this plus the Snuggly Softness and Long-Lasting Freshness you love. To use, shake the closed Snuggle bottle. Open the bottle and measure to desired line in cap. Locate the fabric softener dispenser and pour product into dispenser of your washing machine. Do not pour directly on fabrics. Snuggle fabric softener works in all washing machines including high efficiency (HE) washers. This package includes one 78.75 ounce bottle of 2X concentrated Snuggle SuperCare fabric softener liquid in Lilies and Linen scent, enough for 150 regular loads. *v. leading value liquid detergent alone.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pour a little or a lot into the cap. Toss into your washer before adding your clothes. Pour product into dispenser of your washing machine. To experience Snuggle Freshness: For regular dryer loads, place one sheet on top of wet clothes, use two sheets for large loads or three sheets for extra large loads. Discard after use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this!!! I use it for my wigs and to make my clothes smell good just before I leave out. All homes have their own smell - it’s never a ‘bad’ smell - it’s just your own. I alleviate that smell by mixing three parts fabric softener and one part water in a water bottle. I lightly spray my clothes just before leaving out and I’ve gotten MANY complements abt how great I smell. I use it in my car and on furniture too. It’s like Febreze but lighter. With the wigs - they’re a fabric (those that aren’t human hair), and to keep synthetic wigs fresh and detangled for weeks longer than they’d normally last, the trick is to use fabric softener. This is my favorite one. I LOVE the smell!!! And I love how it keeps my wigs looking brand new!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got Rid of Static
reviews.reviewText: We use this and the super care dryer sheets. We have cold winters and the furnace heats creates a lot of static. This took care of that. I’m not a huge fan of the scent and wish there was a scent free or their original scent option. When I take the laundry out of the washer it’s overwhelming. That being said, I don’t notice it much after drying (so I don’t know why it’s even used). Towels are staying fresh and colors don’t seem to be negatively impacted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is now a regular auto delivery for me since it's NEVER in stock locally. 😞 Grateful it's available on Amazon, even better is it gets delivered to my door! 😊 I do use all products in this scent - dryer sheets (I also put in air vents as air freshener), & dryer scent beeds (I also use those in wax melt warmers!). Laundry day smells amazing & the freshness lasts for weeks in my linen closets & clothes in our closets & drawers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this stuff
reviews.reviewText: Great smell and so soft! Good quality too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is a mess
reviews.reviewText: This is NOT the quality from Snuggle I expect.Have used for years INCLUDING this kind!It's a coagulated, clumpy mess like pouring clabbered milk in the fabric softener release in my washer.AND the SCENT is way off.Almost RANCID.Was such a good deal,got 2!And one more that I CANCELLED! Supposed to be here in 10 days but they don't guarantee a product I AM THROWING AWAY.Amazon, please pull the remaining ones.THIS NO SNUGGLE.Its like the product was added to.AND I tried calling twice the Manufacturer and going to the site PRIOR to this review without any answer except a message that they are all in a meeting???

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good and bad
reviews.reviewText: This does a great job of softening your clothes and giving off a nice scent. The only issue is don’t buy in bulk because after a month or so it’s clumps up and clogs the Dispensers of the washing machine fabric softener area. If you think you’ll use frequently, it’s worth the buy just don’t buy two or three of them and keep on your shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells very good
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the money. Very easy to use, I don't even use full cap size. Just half and the clothes smell very good! This doesn't actually clean your clothes, it's just a scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite snuggle
reviews.reviewText: The smell of this Snuggle is wonderful! The best smelling one I’ve sniffed! And it does a really nice job at keeping the color on your clothes and makes them so soft!
